TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OneWayBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension
Public NotInheritable Class OneWayBindingElement Inherits BindingElement Implements IPolicyExportExtension

summary.span: 啟用封包路由和使用單向方法。

span.span: Enables packet routing and the use of one-way methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要啟用封包路由*單向轉換*層是必要項目，這個類別提供。To enable packet routing a *one-way conversion* layer is required, which this class provides. 這個類別是繫結堆疊中的繫結，它會執行稱為 `OneWayBindingElement` 的訊息層級形狀變更。This class is a binding in the stack of bindings that performs a message-level shape change called `OneWayBindingElement`. 這個形狀變更可以接受 或 ，並將它公開為 ；或是相反地接受 或 ，並將它公開為 。This shape change can take a or a and expose it as a , or conversely it can take a or a and expose it as a . 使用者可以建立自訂繫結，將這個繫結置於工作階段感知或要求-回覆傳輸層上，讓它啟用路由傳送封包功能。A user can create a custom binding that layers this binding over a session-aware or request-reply transport to make it packet routable. 當您要以較原始的方式來公開單向方法時，也可以使用這個類別。This class is also useful when you want to expose one-way methods in a more native fashion. 還有其他轉換可套用至這一層，例如複合雙工和可信賴傳訊。More transformations can be applied over this layer, such as Composite Duplex and Reliable Messaging.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會接收繫結內容當做輸入參數，該參數表示繫結項目的堆疊。This method receives a binding context as an input parameter, which represents the stack of binding elements. 堆疊中每個繫結項目都可以處理查詢本身或委派查詢，或兩者的組合。Each binding element in the stack can handle the inquiry itself or delegate the inquiry, or a combination of the two. 如果是委派查詢，每個繫結項目都可以修改內容。Each binding element can modify the context if it delegates the inquiry. 然而，傳輸繫結項目會處理查詢本身。However, a transport binding element handles the inquiry itself. 這個方法會由繫結項目以及執行階段物件來實作，例如 、 和 。This method is implemented by binding elements as well as by the runtime objects, such as , , and .

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用封包路由。

value.span: 如果已啟用封包路由，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if packet routing is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別可以選擇性地使用訊息層級通訊協定轉換`DuplexSessionChannel` / `RequestChannel` / `ReplyChannel`為單向通道，並允許路由傳送來自轉換之通道訊息。This class can optionally use a message-level protocol that transforms a `DuplexSessionChannel`/`RequestChannel`/`ReplyChannel` to a one-way channel and allows the messages from the transformed channel to be routed. 這個通訊協定的使用是由 屬性所控制。Usage of this protocol is controlled by the property. 當這個屬性是`true`，時`DuplexSessionChannel`初始化 （例如，緩衝處理的 TCP 和具名管道），這個類別會加入訊息標頭 (MustUnderstand = `false`，如果已啟用安全性的簽署)，其語意為 「 您可以封包路由這個通道 」。When this property is `true`, upon `DuplexSessionChannel` initiation (for example, Buffered TCP and Named Pipes), this class adds a message header (MustUnderstand = `false`, signed if security is enabled) that semantically means "you can packet-route this channel". 在接受器端，如果這個屬性為 `true`，這個類別就會在通道上收到的第一個訊息中尋找這個標頭。On the acceptor side, when this property is `true`, this class looks for this header in the first message received on the channel. 如果這個標頭不存在，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 會挑出通道的錯誤。If this header does not exist, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] faults the channel. 如果標頭存在，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 便會將新的通道送入共用的輸入通道中。If the header exists, then [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] funnels the new channel into a shared input channel. 要轉換的要求-回覆通道 （例如，TCP 資料流或 HTTP） 時，這個屬性是`true`，此標頭加入至每個要求發出信號，要求可能會路由傳送封包。To transform a Request-Reply channel (for example, TCP Streaming or HTTP) when this property is `true`, this header is added to every request to signal that the request can be packet routed. [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 也確認`SendRequest`傳回`null`並以回覆`null`在伺服器上。 also verifies that `SendRequest` returns `null` and replies with `null` on the server.

MemberSignature.Value: void IPolicyExportExtension.ExportPolicy (System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter exporter, System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext context);

.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension.ExportPolicy(class System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter exporter, class System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext context) cil managed
Sub ExportPolicy (exporter As MetadataExporter, context As PolicyConversionContext) Implements IPolicyExportExtension.ExportPolicy

virtual void System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension.ExportPolicy(System::ServiceModel::Description::MetadataExporter ^ exporter, System::ServiceModel::Description::PolicyConversionContext ^ context) = System::ServiceModel::Description::IPolicyExportExtension::ExportPolicy;

span.span: The that you can use to modify the exporting process.

param.name: context
param.span: 您可以用於插入自訂原則判斷提示的 。

span.span: The that you can use to insert your custom policy assertion.

summary.span: 匯出可表示單向繫結項目的自訂原則判斷提示。

span.span: Exports a custom policy assertion that represents the one-way binding element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將繫結相關陳述式寫入 WSDL 資訊，這項資訊是由特定合約所公開，並供 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用來將繫結堆疊中包含此自訂繫結項目的資訊傳達給用戶端。This method writes binding-related statements into the WSDL information exposed by a particular contract and is used by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] to communicate to clients the existence of this custom binding element in the binding stack. 這個方法採用兩個參數： 和 物件。This method takes two parameters: the and objects. 您可以使用 、 和 方法，取得已經在各種範圍匯出的原則判斷提示的集合。Use the , , and methods to obtain collections of policy assertions that have already been exported at various scopes. 接著使用這個方法將您自己的原則判斷提示新增至適當的集合中。Then use this method to add your own policy assertions to the appropriate collection. 屬性會公開正在匯出的端點的 。The property exposes the for the endpoint that is being exported. 這可讓這個方法正確限定其匯出原則判斷提示的範圍。This enables this method to correctly scope their exported policy assertions. 例如，程式碼中的安全性屬性可能會將行為新增至 ，指出應在何處新增安全性原則判斷提示。For example, security attributes in code can add behaviors to the that indicate where security policy assertions should be added. 在自訂原則判斷提示附加至 WSDL 資訊之後，用戶端就可以實作 介面來偵測及匯入自訂繫結判斷提示。Once custom policy assertions are attached to the WSDL information, clients can detect and import the custom binding assertions by implementing an interface.

span.span: is .
